answers.answer: Hello,how well controlled are your blood sugars?  What is your Hba1c?To gain weight as a diabetic, you need exercise (weight training / resistance), and increase the protein in your diet.  This will likely be accompanied by an increase in insulin.If your blood sugars are too high, you will be peeing out your sugars (instead of your cells using them).  The solution is to take enough insulin to get your blood sugars as close as possible to normal (80-140 range).Hope this helps.

question: I am a type 1 diabetes, I only got 55kg as I am 174cm tall. I want fatter and muscular. But can't get fat without sugar injection. So what should I do to get fat ?
title: Want to be fatter type 1
